# 1) ParentKeyID -> CaseNodeId using AttrID=1 ("ID")
df_case_id = (
    df_caseattrs_val
    .filter(F.col("AttrID") == 1)
    .select(
        F.col("ParentKeyID"),
        F.col("AttrValue").cast("int").alias("CaseNodeId")
    )
    .dropna(subset=["CaseNodeId"])
    .dropDuplicates(["ParentKeyID"])
)

# 2) Keep only AttrIDs you care about (you can widen this gradually)
wanted_attr_ids = list(ATTR_MAP.keys())

df_attrs_filtered = (
    df_caseattrs_val
    .filter(F.col("AttrID").isin(wanted_attr_ids))
    .join(df_case_id, on="ParentKeyID", how="inner")
    .select("CaseNodeId", "AttrID", "AttrValue")
)

# 3) Pivot to wide
df_case_attrs_wide = (
    df_attrs_filtered
    .groupBy("CaseNodeId")
    .pivot("AttrID", wanted_attr_ids)
    .agg(F.first("AttrValue"))
)

# 4) Rename pivoted columns to friendly names
for attr_id, col_name in ATTR_MAP.items():
    if str(attr_id) in df_case_attrs_wide.columns:
        df_case_attrs_wide = df_case_attrs_wide.withColumnRenamed(str(attr_id), col_name)

display(df_case_attrs_wide.limit(50))
print("Distinct cases with attributes:", df_case_attrs_wide.count())
